FuncDef:
The multicast layer-2 ipv6 source-lifetime command sets the aging time for (S, G) entries of multicast traffic in a specified VLAN.
The undo multicast layer-2 ipv6 source-lifetime command restores the default setting. The multicast layer-2 ipv6 source-lifetime command sets the aging time for (S, G) entries of multicast traffic in a specified VLAN. The undo multicast layer-2 ipv6 source-lifetime command restores the default setting. By default, the aging time is 210s for an (S, G) or (*, G) entry of multicast traffic in a specified VLAN. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the aging time for (S, G) entries of multicast traffic in a specified VLAN.
The value is an integer ranging from 60 to 65535, in seconds. The default value is 210.
